entry.title: New release for Lingarr: 0.9.6
entry.content:
I'm excited to bring you another update packed with new features, improvements, and fixes! This release focuses on enhancing subtitle handling, improving accessibility, refining translation management, and making backend operations more reliable. With key upgrades like support for overlapping subtitle fixes, new AI services, exclusions and thresholds.

Features

  • Added new AI services: DeepSeek and Gemini
  • Added support for fixing overlapping subtitles
  • Introduced file age delay configuration per media type
  • Added options to exclude media or set a file age delay for translation
  • Implemented delete functionality for translation requests
  • Implemented resuming translation requests on restart
  • Enhanced translation request status handling and updates
  • Added option to store Hangfire jobs in MySQL

Bug fixes and Improvements

  • Major refactor of SRT parsing
  • Fixed active translation count
  • Fixed display of language chart statistics
  • Fixed episode number handling
  • Fixed language selection errors caused by filtered results
  • Fixed API changes for Anthropic integration
  • Removed sync button from integrations
  • Improved accessibility with updated navigation
  • Cleaned up statistics chart code
  • Upgraded frontend packages
  • Applied new code formatting

entry.title: New release for Lingarr: 0.9.7
entry.content:
I’m excited to present Lingarr 0.9.7, packed with powerful updates that make subtitle translation more accurate, customizable, and easy! This release introduces context-aware translations, new AI parameter controls, and the ability to validate subtitle files before translation. Additionally, managing your translation history just got easier with multi-deletion support, and I've enhanced the app with dynamic language and model fetching, no more waiting for a new model addition via a release.

What's New

Context-Aware Translations Subtitle translations via LLMs are now context-aware (if configured), including lines before and after the current subtitle. This improves contextual and cultural accuracy.

Custom AI Parameters Support You can now add your own custom parameters, such as temperature, top_k, and others, when configuring AI translation services. Which gives you greater control over the translation behavior and output quality.

Subtitle Validation Rules Configure validation rules for subtitle files, including: - Minimum and maximum subtitle display time - Minimum and maximum character count - Maximum subtitle file size

If a file fails validation, the translation will be canceled automatically.

Multi-Deletion for Translation History You can now delete multiple translation history items at once, no more messy history page. Dynamic Language and Model Fetching

entry.title: New release for Lingarr: 0.9.9
entry.content:
I’m excited to release Lingarr 0.9.9!

What's New

Structured Output Support Subtitle translations via LLMs now support structured output, making translating faster.

Basic Tagging Support You can now tag your subtitles with translated or any other label you prefer. More tagging options may be added in future releases.

In-App Log Viewer An in-app log viewer has been added, making logs accessible from the interface.

Other Improvements: - Improved subtitle processing logic - Various other housekeeping improvements
